import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import WeightIcon from '../images/weights.png' function SidePanel(props){ const [squads, updateSquads] = useState([]) const squad_names = props.squads.map((squad,i) =>

props.updateSquad(squad)}>{squad}

) return(

Trainings

{squad_names}

Regattas

Events

) } export default SidePanel
